channel.title: Vehicles of the Future on Kalijor.com
channel.description: Recent content in Vehicles of the Future on Kalijor.com

item.title: Arc Ships
item.description: title: Arc Ships desc: date: 2019/01/25 version: 1.0.0 template: nav: Arc_Ships percent: 100 authors: These massive vessels were built to send humanity out into the stars before the advent of super-luminal drive technology. Arc-Ships were designed to house tens of thousands of people, have facilities to grow food and recycle waste, and otherwise be completely enclosed, self-sustaining ecosystems. They left earth with crews numbering in the thousands, and were intended to travel to the closest stars to Sol that had been determined to have Earth-type planetoids orbiting them.

item.title: The End
